reference.name: Resource details
reference.description: This section allows you to define the basic details of a resource, such as its name, type, and category. Resources can be spaces or items available for booking, like meeting rooms or equipment.

fields.name: Resource name
fields.description: The name of the resource.
fields.notes: This field supports localized text.

fields.name: Available at
fields.description: The location where this resource is available.
fields.notes: Selecting a 'network' location makes it available at all locations in that network.

fields.name: Resource type
fields.description: The type of resource.
fields.notes: Resources of the same type share the same set of prices.

fields.name: Category
fields.description: The category of the resource.
fields.notes: Suggestions are available based on existing group names.

reference.name: Web portal and members app
reference.description: This section manages the visibility of the resource on the web portal and members app, including details for email confirmations.

fields.name: Display this resource on the web portal and the members App.
fields.description: Visibility toggle for the resource.

fields.name: Display this resource in the administration panel calendar.
fields.description: Visibility toggle for the admin panel calendar.
fields.notes: This is a reversed checkbox.

fields.name: Resource details
fields.description: Detailed description of the resource.
fields.notes: Supports localized text.

fields.name: Email confirmation details
fields.description: Text included in the booking confirmation email.
fields.notes: Use the '{confirmationContent}' token in email templates.

fields.name: Photo
fields.description: Upload a photo of the resource.
fields.notes: Preview available for uploaded images.

fields.name: Direct link
fields.description: A direct link to book this resource.
fields.notes: Visible if the resource is not archived and is visible.

reference.name: Location
reference.description: This section allows you to set the geographical location of the resource using a map component.

fields.name: Map
fields.description: Set the latitude and longitude of the resource.
fields.notes: Allows for precise location setting with a maximum distance of 10 meters.

reference.name: Features
reference.description: This section allows you to specify the unique features available with the resource. These features enhance the usability and comfort of the space.

fields.name: Standing Desk
fields.description: This resource provides a standing desk.
fields.notes: Ideal for users who prefer or require a standing workspace.

fields.name: Quiet Zone
fields.description: This resource is in a quiet zone.
fields.notes: Suitable for activities requiring minimal noise.

fields.name: Privacy Screen
fields.description: This resource is surrounded by a privacy screen.
fields.notes: Ensures privacy for sensitive work.

fields.name: Soundproof
fields.description: This resource is in a soundproof room.
fields.notes: Perfect for confidential meetings or recordings.

fields.name: Catering
fields.description: This resource offers catering.
fields.notes: Food and beverage services are available.

fields.name: Tea and Coffee
fields.description: This resource offers tea and coffee.
fields.notes: Refreshments are provided.

fields.name: Drinks
fields.description: This resource offers drinks.
fields.notes: Beverages are available for users.

reference.name: Amenities
reference.description: This section lists the amenities available with the resource, enhancing the functionality and convenience of the space.

fields.name: Projector
fields.description: This resource includes a projector.
fields.notes: Useful for presentations and meetings.

fields.name: Internet
fields.description: This resource provides access to the internet.
fields.notes: Ensure connectivity for all users.

fields.name: Wireless Charger
fields.description: This resource includes a wireless charger.
fields.notes: Convenient for charging compatible devices.

fields.name: Conference Phone
fields.description: This resource provides a conference phone.
fields.notes: Facilitates group calls and meetings.

fields.name: Standard Phone
fields.description: This resource provides a standard phone.
fields.notes: Basic telephony services available.

fields.name: Whiteboard
fields.description: This resource has a whiteboard.
fields.notes: Ideal for brainstorming and planning.

fields.name: Flip Chart
fields.description: This resource has a flip-chart.
fields.notes: Useful for presentations and workshops.

fields.name: Desktop Monitor
fields.description: This resource has a desktop monitor.
fields.notes: Enhances visual display for users.

fields.name: Large Display
fields.description: This resource has a large display.
fields.notes: Suitable for large group presentations.

fields.name: Dual Display Screen
fields.description: This resource has dual displays.
fields.notes: Increases screen real estate for multitasking.

fields.name: Display Screen
fields.description: This resource has a single display.
fields.notes: Basic display functionality.

fields.name: Video Conferencing
fields.description: This resource has video conferencing.
fields.notes: Supports virtual meetings and collaborations.

fields.name: Wireless Presentation
fields.description: This resource has a wireless presentation.
fields.notes: Allows for cable-free presentations.

fields.name: PA System
fields.description: This resource has a PA system.
fields.notes: Suitable for announcements and large gatherings.

fields.name: Secure Storage
fields.description: This resource has secure storage.
fields.notes: Ensures safety of personal belongings.

reference.name: Security
reference.description: This section outlines the security features available with the resource, ensuring safety and protection.

fields.name: Security Lock
fields.description: This resource can be locked securely.
fields.notes: Provides peace of mind for users.

fields.name: CCTV
fields.description: This resource is recorded using CCTV.
fields.notes: Monitors and records activities for security.

fields.name: Voice Recorder
fields.description: This resource provides a voice recorder.
fields.notes: Useful for recording meetings and discussions.

reference.name: Environment
reference.description: This section describes the environmental features of the resource, contributing to comfort and ambiance.

fields.name: Air Conditioning
fields.description: This resource has air conditioning.
fields.notes: Ensures a comfortable temperature.

fields.name: Heating
fields.description: This resource has heating.
fields.notes: Provides warmth during colder months.

fields.name: Natural Light
fields.description: This resource has natural light.
fields.notes: Creates a pleasant and inviting atmosphere.

reference.name: Resource rates
reference.description: This section allows you to define various rates for resources based on user type, time of day, day of the week, or booking duration. It helps in managing pricing strategies effectively.

fields.name: ResourceTypes
fields.description: The type of resource for which the rate is being set.
fields.notes: Ensure the resource type is correctly selected to apply the appropriate rate.

fields.name: IsBookingCredit
fields.description: Indicates if the rate is a booking credit.
fields.notes: Set to false by default; adjust if using booking credits.

reference.name: Available times and days
reference.description: Set the times of the day and days of the week when this resource is available.

fields.name: Timeslots
fields.description: Define the available times for the resource.
fields.notes: If no timeslots are set, the resource is always available.

reference.name: Capacity
reference.description: Set how many people can be accommodated in this resource.

fields.name: AllowMultipleBookings
fields.description: Enable simultaneous bookings for this resource.
fields.notes: Useful for resources like hot-desks.

fields.name: Allocation
fields.description: Define the capacity of the resource.
fields.notes: Specify the number of bookings or persons allowed.

fields.name: LimitVisitorsToAllocation
fields.description: Limit the number of guests based on capacity.
fields.notes: Ensures guest numbers do not exceed capacity.

reference.name: Requests and cancellations
reference.description: Control when bookings can be made, changed, or cancelled by customers.

fields.name: BookInAdvanceLimit
fields.description: Set the maximum hours in advance a booking can be made.
fields.notes: Default is 24 hours.

fields.name: LateBookingLimit
fields.description: Set the minimum hours before a booking starts.
fields.notes: Default is 1 hour.

fields.name: Late cancellations
fields.description: Options for handling late cancellations.
fields.notes: May include a cancellation fee.

fields.name: RequiresConfirmation
fields.description: Require administrator confirmation for bookings.
fields.notes: Ensures all bookings are reviewed.

reference.name: Duration
reference.description: Control how long or short bookings can be and the times they can start and end.

fields.name: MaxBookingLength
fields.description: Set the maximum duration for a booking.
fields.notes: Default is 60 minutes.

fields.name: MinBookingLength
fields.description: Set the minimum duration for a booking.
fields.notes: Default is 60 minutes.

fields.name: IntervalLimit
fields.description: Set fixed intervals for bookings.
fields.notes: Only accepts 15-minute intervals.

fields.name: Shifts
fields.description: Define start/end times for bookings.
fields.notes: Useful for resources with specific operating hours.

reference.name: Customer and teams
reference.description: Set which types of members and teams can make bookings for this resource.

fields.name: CustomerTypeFormControl
fields.description: Define who can book the resource.
fields.notes: Options include members, contacts, and specific teams.

fields.name: OnlyForInvoicingBusiness
fields.description: Restrict bookings to customers with a specific home location.
fields.notes: Useful for businesses with multiple locations.

reference.name: Combined resources
reference.description: Combine resources to create a single bookable unit.

fields.name: LinkedResources
fields.description: Select resources that are locked when this resource is booked.
fields.notes: Ensures combined resources are booked together.

reference.name: No-return policies
reference.description: Control how close to each other bookings can be made to allow for preparation time.

fields.name: NoReturnPoliciesControls
fields.description: Set rules for gaps between bookings.
fields.notes: Useful for cleaning and preparation.

reference.name: Zoom Integration
reference.description: Connect this resource to a licensed Zoom account to include a Zoom Meeting link when it is booked. Each resource must be connected to a separate Zoom user account to avoid conflicts.
reference.messages: If no Zoom user is connected, a button to connect is shown. If a Zoom user is connected, a button to disconnect is shown.

fields.name: Include a Zoom Meeting link
fields.description: Option to include a Zoom Meeting link in all bookings made for this resource.
fields.notes: This option is disabled if no Zoom user is connected.

reference.name: NexBoard by Nexudus
reference.description: Use NexBoard to display availability outside each meeting room and let customers book rooms quickly. Use the iBeacon numbers to link them to this resource.

fields.name: iBeacon major
fields.description: Displays the major number for iBeacon.
fields.notes: This number can be copied to the clipboard.

fields.name: iBeacon minor
fields.description: Displays the minor number for iBeacon.
fields.notes: This number can be copied to the clipboard.

reference.name: Calendar iCal Feeds
reference.description: Use these links to show bookings in any iCal compatible calendar software like Outlook or Google Calendar.

fields.name: All resources without member details
fields.description: Link to show all resources without member details.
fields.notes: This link can be copied to the clipboard.

fields.name: All resources with member details
fields.description: Link to show all resources with member details.
fields.notes: This link can be copied to the clipboard.

fields.name: This resource without member details
fields.description: Link to show this specific resource without member details.
fields.notes: This link can be copied to the clipboard.

fields.name: This resource with member details
fields.description: Link to show this specific resource with member details.
fields.notes: This link can be copied to the clipboard.

short_description: Understanding Resources in the Nexudus Platform
description: In the Nexudus Platform, **Resources** refer to bookable or rentable items and spaces within your venue that members can reserve or use. These can include meeting rooms, phone booths, event spaces, and specialized equipment like 3D printers. Resources are distinct from permanent allocations like dedicated desks or private offices, which are not typically booked for short-term use.
when: Use 'Resources' when you need to manage and facilitate the booking of spaces or items that are shared among members. Avoid using 'Resources' for permanent allocations such as dedicated desks or private offices, which are not intended for short-term booking.
examples: Meeting rooms, Boardrooms and Conference rooms
Phone booths or private call pods
Materials or tools in a Makerspace
